The main donations reach us from the community (the citizens), some enterprises / companies or through fund-raising campaigns (like Christmas Fair, our organized events, initiatives of other kind people and similar).There are many ways in which you can donate to DogSpot, be it with your time, your skills, adopting, fostering or by making a financial donation.Your donations will help us provide the necessary medical care that many our foster dogs so dearly need. Did you know that the average medical bill for our fostered flat-nosed dog before they are ready for re-homing is in average about five hundred euros?Despite the costs of our rescue activity, there is no adoption fee for our adopted dog. We believe that the best “donation” or “gift”, doesn’t matter, how we call it – is a new and real HOME for all our fostered dog, regardless of their age, appearance or remaining health issues.HOW DO WE DO ITAll our work is based on the network of temporary fostering homes. This means that we arenʾt and we donʾt see ourselves as a common or traditional shelter. In our opinion the appropriate fostering and care of our fostered flat-nosed dogs is possible only under home-like conditions. Therefore it is our main way of care and rehabilitation.For already 4 years we have been spending at least 4-5 months at the rented homestead near Vilnius, which we are calling DogSpot Village. But the standards of keeping our fostered dogs here also remain the same – dogs live in their rooms, they have every possibility to spend their time free and without any space restrictions (for example, cages). We have noticed that in this environment our dogs feel just great! More space for playing in the yard, fresh air, nature, more activities, movement, more opportunities to implement rehabilitation steps.Since we started we have rescued 345 dogs, most of them came from horrible conditions (usually – puppy mills), left outside, covered in dirt, fleas, malnourished, exhausted, abused, scared of their own shadow.SO WHAT IS THE BIG DREAM?We have been working with abandoned and neglected flat-nosed dogs for five years already. We have no holidays, no weekends, no time to say “NO” or “THE END”. As our helping hands are a big BEGINNING of something new, something amazing for the dogs, who had never felt the breeze of fresh air, who had never experienced the touch of green grass and who never imagined their life could be different than cage, neglect, abuse and one pregnancy after another...Our dream is to establish our own DogSpot Village. A rehabilitation place, center, for our fostered flat-nosed dogs and other dogs who experienced traumas. It is our dream for such a long time... Maybe it is time to make this dream come true?Homestead or DogSpot Village would allow to accept more unnecessary dogs, to make our work more efficient. It would be a place of our own. No rents, not temporary premises. Our fostered dogs would be completely safe and we would be able to work with less stress. It would be a place for all those, who arenʾt able to find their true homes because of their age, illnesses or health pathologies.Help us make this DREAM come true and become the superheroes of the flat-noses!VISION OF THE REHABILITATION SPOTThe main point of the rehabilitation center is to create space, conditions and means for the more efficient rehabilitation of our fostered dogs.We are planning to establish a rehabilitation zone with treadmill, stability balls, stimulating mats and other dog gym equipment. On the same floor a place for quarantine is foreseen, a cabinet for procedures (for example, for massage, light therapy, acupuncture and electrostimulation with NeuroTrac TENS machines) and a dog bath tub.All our fostered flat-noses would live in the rooms specially designed and arranged for them. Also we would have a general space (living room) with kitchen.Outdoor area would be used for a swimming pool, as water procedures (hydrotherapy) are in particular useful for the dogs after spinal and knee-cap surgeries. Also it would be a great activity for our beloved senior fostered dogs – swimming is highly beneficial for older dogs both for strengthening of muscles and treatment of arthritis. As we are cooperating with dog training schools, our own space would allow arranging joined lessons for our fostered dogs in order to help cope them with fears and to solve their behavior issues more efficiently.We have a lot of experience in the field of canine rehabilitation. We know, how obtain high level results even with the use of quite “domestic” measures. Can you imagine what we would be able to do if we had the specialized and equipped place – DogSpot rehabilitation center?*************************KAS MES ESAME?DogSpotas yra ne pelno siekianti organizacija arba, kaip save vadiname, suplotasnukių gelbėtojai.Mūsų misija – ištiesti pagalbos ranką bei surasti naujus namus benamiams suplotasnukiams (prancūzų buldogams, anglų buldogams, mopsams, pekinams, bokseriams bei šių veislių mišrūnams) ir kitiems likimo nuskriaustiems šunims, kurie dėl ligų, negalios, patirtų traumų ar kitų priežasčių tapo nereikalingi, atsidūrė gatvėje arba sanitarinėse tarnybose.MŪSŲ „KLIENTAI“Dalies DogSpoto globojamų suplotasnukių atsisako šeimininkai. Vieni į globą atkeliauja iš vietinių sanitarinių tarnybų, kitus žmonės tiesiog palieka veterinarinėse klinikose.Deja, didžiausia globotinių dalis (apie 70 proc.) – buvę daugyklų „gyventojai“ ir „darbuotojai“. Išnaudoti, išsunkti, atrodytų, iki paskutinio lašo.Šunų daugykla yra vieta, kurioje visas dėmesys skiriamas kuo didesniam pelnui. Kuo mažesnės išlaidos dauginamiems gyvūnams – tuo didesnis pelnas lieka daugintojui. Natūralu, gyvūnų sveikata ir gerovė šioje grandyje lieka paskutinėje vietoje. Kalės yra kergiamos per kiekvieną rują, pradedant nuo labai ankstyvo amžiaus (pirmosios rujos). Rujoms padažninti kalėms leidžiami hormonai. Joms ne tik nepakanka laiko atgauti jėgas tarp vadų, bet dėl prastų laikymo sąlygų, skurdžios mitybos bei patiriamo streso, jos gana per trumpą laiką tampa nebetinkamos veisimui, todėl yra užmigdomos arba nužudomos kitais būdais.Daugyklose šunys didžiąją laiko dalį dažniausiai praleidžia ankštuose narvuose, tvartuose arba voljeruose Narvuose laikomi šunys yra priversti vaikščioti vielinėmis grotomis, kurios žaloja irdeformuoja letenas. Nesulaukę reikiamos veterinarinės pagalbos bei priežiūros daugyklų „gyventojai“ kenčia nuo ausų infekcijų, įvairių odos ligų, dehidratacijos, mažakraujystės, akių opų bei ragenų uždegimų, kurie negydomi priveda iki aklumo.Pirkėjai, norintys kuo pigiau įsigyti į vieną ar kitą veislę panašų šunelį, sukuria paklausą, kurią daugintojai siekia patenkinti. Nedaugelis susimąsto, kad „pigesnis“ šuniukas turi savo kainą. Ir ji – labai didelė. Tai daugyklose kankinamos kalės ir reproduktoriai, kurie visą gyvenimą praleidžia ankštame narve, prieblandoje, baisioje smarvėje, niekada nevedžiojami, neglostomi, dažnai gulintys savo šlapime ir išmatose.Mūsų užduotis ne tik gydyti ir reabilituoti jų suluošintus kūnus. Mūsų tikslas – išmokyti juos vėl patikėti žmogumi. Mūsų misija – suteikti jiems naują gyvenimą, kurio jie yra daugiau, nei verti.PAGRINDINIAI VEIKLOS PRINCIPAIDogSpoto organizacija yra tik laikina stotelė tarp šuns buvusio gyvenimo ir naujojo gyvenimo tikruose namuose. Mūsų organizacija neturi būstinės, mes neturime nustatytų darbo valandų. Mes turime šaunių savanorių, kuriuos vadiname DogSpoto komanda arba, tiesiog DogSpoto šeima. Šiuo metu mūsų savanorių ir globėjų namų tinklas apima įvairius Lietuvos kampelius, tačiau pagrindinės atstovybės yra Vilniuje, Kaune, Šiauliuose ir Klaipėdoje.Mūsų organizacijoje gyvūnams nėra taikoma eutanazija ir mes niekada nenusigręžiame bei nesakome „NE“ suplotasnukiui, kuriam reikia pagalbos, dėl jo ligų, medicininių poreikių ar amžiaus.VETERINARINĖ PRIEŽIŪRASavo globotiniams užtikriname reikiamą veterinarinę priežiūrą bei gydymą. Globotiniams atliekamos apžiūros, kraujo tyrimai, jie nukirminami, skiepijami, ženklinami. Tai tik dalis visiems atliekamų procedūrų – būtent veterinarinės išlaidos sudaro didžiausią mūsų sąnaudų dalį.Labai dažnai globotiniams prireikia sudėtingų operacijų, kompiuterinės tomografijos tyrimų, kokybiškų gydomųjų pašarų ir kitų procedūrų.Būtent veterinarinės išlaidos sudaro didžiausią mūsų sąnaudų dalį.Labai svarbus aspektas mūsų veikloje – sterilizacija ir kastracija. Tai vienintelis būdas kontroliuoti beglobių gyvūnų populiaciją bei užkirsti kelią į vieną ar kitą veislę panašių gyvūnų išnaudojimui.Didelį dėmesį skiriame globotinių emociniams poreikiams bei elgsenos problemoms.Apie 80 procentų mūsų globojamų suplotasnukių yra smarkiai neprižiūrėti ir apleisti, taigi jų paruošimas į naujus namus gali užtrukti nuo 3 iki 6 mėnesių.NAMŲ SUTEIKIMASDogSpotas nėra įprasta gyvūnų prieglauda, į kurią atvykę norėtojai gali išsirinkti šunį ir parsivežti jį namo. Potencialūs „norėtojai“ yra kruopščiai atrenkami ir privalo atitikti tam tikrus kriterijus. Tokiu būdu siekiame savo globotiniams surasti pačius geriausius namus. Mūsų tikslas – tinkamiems norėtojams surasti jiems tobulai tinkamą globotinį. Mes norime būti visiškai tikri, kad dėl nekokybiško dovanojimo daug praeityje kentėję suplotasnukiai vėl nebūtų išduoti, neprižiūrimi ar kitaip skriaudžiami.AUKOJIMASKadangi DogSpotas yra ne pelno siekianti viešoji įstaiga, už didžiąją veiklai reikalingą lėšų dalį esame dėkingi paprastiems žmonėms. Priešingai nei daugelis galvoja, valstybė nefinansuoja gyvūnų prieglaudų ir gyvūnų gerovės organizacijų veiklų. Pagrindiniai aukotojai yra gyventojai bei įmonės, taip pat reikiamų lėšų pavyksta surinkti įvairių renginių (pavyzdžiui, Kalėdinės mugės beglobiams paremti) bei pavienių žmonių iniciatyvumo dėka. Didelė finansinė paspirtis – 2 proc. nuo GPM parama, kurią gauname kartą per metus.Prisidėti prie DogSpoto veiklos galima įvairiausiais būdais: galite skirti savo laiką, įgūdžius, užsiimti laikina globa arba skirti norimo dydžio auką (mažų aukų – nėra).Jūsų aukos padės mums užtikrinti tinkamą globotinių priežiūrą bei gydymą, kurio kaina neretai siekia įspūdingas sumas. Ar žinojote, kad vidutinės išlaidos, kurių prireikia norint paruošti vieną mūsų globotinį išvykimui į naujus namus, siekia apie penkis šimtus eurų?Nepaisant mūsų gelbėjimo veiklos išlaidų, Jums nereikės mokėti jokių mokesčių norint į savo šeimą priimti DogSpoto globotinį.Mes esame tikri, kad geriausia „auka“ ar „dovana“ yra NAUJI ir TIKRI namai mūsų išglobotam suplotasnukiui. Nepriklausomai nuo jo amžiaus, išvaizdos ir sveikatos ypatumų.KAIP MES DIRBAME?Visus ketverius metus dirbome namų globų tinklo principu. Tai reiškia, kad mes nesame ir nelaikome savęs įprasta šunų prieglauda. Mes manome, kad tinkama mūsų globotinių priežiūra yra įmanoma tik namų sąlygomis, todėl stengiamės tai suteikti ir užtikrinti visiems savo globotiniams. Tai leidžia mums ne tik kokybiškai išslaugyti, reabilituoti globotinį, bet ir pasirūpinti jo psichologinėmis reikmėmis, socializacija, dresūra.Jau trejus metus, kiekvieną vasarą mažiausiai 4-5 mėnesius praleidžiame nuomojamoje sodyboje, kurią vadiname DogSpoto Kaimu. Tačiau globotinių laikymo standartai čia nesikeičia – šunys gyvena kambariukuose, taigi jų laikymo sąlygos labiau primena laikinus namus. Pastebėjome, kad sodyboje šunys jaučiasi ypač gerai – daugiau laisvės judėti, gamta, grynas oras, daugiau veiklos, aktyvumo, daugiau galimybių užsiimti mankštomis bei reabilitacija baseine.TAI KOKIA TA MŪSŲ DIDŽIOJI SVAJONĖ?Jau ketvirti metai be atokvėpio dirbame ir gelbėjame likimo nuskriaustus suplotasnukius. Vieni kitus paremdami, padrąsindami ir palaikydami. Apie nuosavą DogSpoto Kaimą, apie reabilitacijos centrą globojamiems suplotasnukiams bei kitiems traumas patyrusiems šunims svajojame jau seniai. Galbūt atėjo laikas šiai svajonei išsipildyti?Sodyba arba DogSpoto kaimas leistų mums be streso priimti daugiau globotinių, kokybiškiau juos globoti ir reabilituoti. Tai būtų vieta, kurioje nebūtume svečiai, nebūtume nuomininkai. Tai būtų saugi užuovėja ir prieglobstis mūsų globotiniams. Tai būtų vieta, kurioje jiems skirtą laiką nugyventų visi globotiniai, kurie taip ir nerado namų dėl savo amžiaus, ligų ar patologijų.Padėkite svajonei išsipildyti ir tapkite suplotasnukių superherojais!REABILITACIJOS CENTRO VIZIJAReabilitacijos centro esmė – sukurti erdvę, sąlygas bei priemones efektyvesniam globotinių reabilitavimui.Planuojama reabilitacijos zona su bėgimo takeliu, balansiniais kamuoliais, stimuliuojančiais kilimėliais ir kitomis šunų mankštai reikalingomis priemonėmis. Tame pačiame aukšte planuojama karantino vieta, procedūrų kabinetas (pavyzdžiui, masažo, šviesox terapijos, akupunktūros, elektrostimuliacijos procedūroms), gyvūnų maudymui skirta vonia.Visi šunys gyventų specialiai jiems skirtuose, pagal poreikius pritaikytuose kambariuose. Taip pat būtų suformuota bendra zona (svetainė) su virtuve.Lauke būtų įrengtas baseinas. Vandens procedūros (hidroterapija) ypatingai naudingos šunims po stuburo išvaržų, girnelių operacijų, o taip pat pasitarnautų senjorų raumenų stiprinimui. Kadangi bendradarbiaujame su dresūros mokyklomis, turėdami savo kiemą galėtume rengti jungtines dresūros pamokas savo globotiniams, padėti įveikti jiems savo baimes ir efektyviau spręsti elgsenos problemas.Reabilitacijos srityje turime tikrai daug patirties. Žinome, kaip pasiekti ypač gerą rezultatą naudojant, atrodytų, gana „buitines“ priemones. Tik pagalvokite, ką galėtume nuveikti, jeigu turėtume tam skirtą ir pritaikytą vietą – DogSpoto reabilitacijos centrą.

story:
Our New Robot Needs Compost to Sort

We are training our new robot to sort trash and recyclables out of compost - Here's why:

  • We at Waste Busters want to cool the planet with Zero Waste, but sorting isn't always optimal
  • Our robot will be sorting food waste and organics to compost instead of landfill
  • Your contribution will help us install our robot in a trailer and feed it with material to sort by putting a bin lifter on the side to pick up and dump carts of material for the robot

With your help, we can make sorting compost a winning proposition, keeping organics out of landfills and cooling the planet. This also protects our crew, making sorting safer and cleaner.

What We Need, What the Robot Needs & What You Get

  • We already bought a robot (WOW, RIGHT?) but we need help getting it out to events
  • A bin lifter and trailer modifications to the trailer are needed
  • The design, install and power source will be another large expense we need help with
  • All funds raised will go toward forwarding this project to get our robot more material to sort
  • Your contribution gets you some small perks, but goes toward keeping compost out of the landfill - your donation will be used to get compost and recyclables out of landfills

The Impact

Zero Waste :

  • Composting and Recycling reduces green house gasses, pollution and waste
  • We have introduced composting to many large events and have serviced millions of event goers attending events in the San Francisco Bay and around California, introducing them to our Zero Waste programs
  • Getting people to manually sort food waste is a real challenge and our talented team could be doing more to educate and inspire while we're out cleaning and greening events
  • Robotic sorting makes it cheaper for our clients to produce green events and the work safer for our staff

Risks & Challenges

As far as we know, no one is doing this with robots yet. There are tens of millions of tons of compostable discards still going to California landfills and there needs to be new ways to get it out. We know it will be a learning curve training our robot to sort efficiently but that is the risk we are going to take and the problem we are working on solving.

  • With over 9 years of experience in producing Zero Waste Events, Michael and Waste Busters have become an expert in the field, serving some of the biggest events and training others on how to do Zero Waste events right
  • The Robot and conveyor will make sorting safer, more efficient and easier for our team
  • If you go to events in the City or where we work, you have probably seen our team being one of the hardest working crews on site, bending, lifting and sorting till we drop - we do it because we love these great events, our planet and Zero Waste but it hard work. You can help or show some love without getting your hands dirty - just contribute and share!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a contribution there are other ways to share:

  • Post about our campaign in your circles to help us raise awareness and find more supporters
  • Ask an environmental group to make a contribution as a marketing tool
  • Ask your favorite event to contribute and bring us out to sort at the event
  • Post to pages where people might be interested in this approach and who might want to keep up with us and future campaigns
  • Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of young enthusiasts from Serbia,who want their ideas and projects to change the way of thinking in humans and show how are a healthy environment and the nature important things for humans.We want to make the world a better place through various projects and fundraising campaigns.Help us improve the world,one project at the time.I am Dragoljub Milankov.Our team is currently small,but day by day it's becoming bigger,and our ideas are becoming more serious.

    What is that"Tisa Mayfly"?

Unique world phenomenon THE FLOWER OF TISA(Palingenia Longicauda)

The Tisa Mayfly (Palingenia longicauda) is the largest mayfly species in Europe,males measuring up to 12 cm (5 inches) from head to tail.This long-tailed mayflies are aquatic insects which belong to the Ephemeroptera order.Their larval stage usually lasts three years.The adults are short-lived: once fully matured,they have roughly three hours to mate and then die.Male Tisa Mayflies are unique among the winged insects in that they molt one more time after acquiring functional wings.This second-to-last winged instar is usually a matter of minutes.Tisa’s flower is an ancient insect species.Ascendants of this species emerged some 200 million years ago. Unlike many other species of mayflies, adult P.longicauda never move away from water;they fly low and their cerci are frequently touching or sweeping the surface.The slow-moving river and absence of surface-feeding fish help make this possible.The presence of P. longicauda is an indicator of clean unpolluted water. Now extinct in many European countries,it can be found in Serbia and Hungary on the Tisza river,as well as in Romania,

 

About this phenomenon


This is rare scene, wedding dance above Tisa River. Only few days in June every year (even not every year),beautiful insect Tisa's flower or Tisa mayflies (Palingenia longicauda) are being born, making love and die.

After three hours,everything is finished.Palingenia longicauda doesn't have mouth because it doesn't eat - it just makes love and dies, during his short but beautiful life. This is realy amazing scene and it is very hard to show it by photo or words...

It is possible to enjoy one of the most beautiful natural phenomenons in the world that lasts only five days in early June. Thousands of yellow insects fly in fervor just above the river surface conjuring the creation of the universe.The Tisa flower lives for three years at the bottom of the river.It very well represents the essence of nature's imagination,which is for only a few hours perfectly reflected in the passion of these delicate beings.After mating, the female mayflies start a compensation flight up the river, to ensure that the eggs laid on the river will sink down to the bottom at the place where their parents emerged. After about 45 days, the eggs hatch into larvae, which remain buried in the mud for three years, until they emerge and molt into adults.

When and where we can see Tisa Mayfly?

Typically,all Tisa Mayflies mature at once,and for about a week in mid June(from 13 to 15 June),they will be everywhere after 5.00-6.00 PM,dancing over the river in large groups,molting on trees or on the ground, or resting on every available surface,including onlookers.This natural phenomenon with varied intensity is called Tisa blooming.Once they fully mature (after their second molting into a winged state),males have only a few hours to find females and mate before both sexes die. Squadrons of mature males will skim over the river's surface,seeking females.


Why  Tisa Mayfly is threatened?

The mayflies are pollution-sensitive animals, thus if they are in or around the water, the water should be of a good quality. Besides being environmental indicators, the mayflies are also a favorite food of many fish, and consequently a favorite bait used by fishermen. 
The Tisa Mayfly has become extinct in many European countries, and now it can be seen only in Novi Becej,Serbia (Vojvodina province).

We need to stop this and save Tisa Mayfly!!!

 

What is our goal?
 

Our goal is to research and preserve this amazing insect with funds collected trough this project.
We need donations for equipment which would help us do in-depth analysis and research to find out the main problems of Mayfly extinction and how can we stop it.We want to make a documentary about this amazing insects, and to publish it free for all.We want people to preserve this phenomenon with us, for years to come.
Also, one of the legends states that in Novi Becej in river Tisa Attila The Hun was buried.
He was buried with his triple coffin – which was made of gold, silver and iron and rests at the bottom of the river Tisa.Many people believe and local stories of the elderly states that his burial site is near City Novi Becej on the bottom of the river, but to this day no research have been started in hope to find Attila the Hun’s treasure chest.
The stories tell that Attila the Hun was located near the island in the middle of river Tisa, which can be visited.Also it’s a great location to research the Tisa flower insect.
Also, each year In that time we have a celebration on river bank called Tisa River of love, where we celebrate this unique phenomenon and Love in general.In the evening you can see thousands of small floating candles all across the river.

Also,with us you can visit interesting Island in the middle of Tisa river.On this island we love to enjoy with our family,friends...and that can expect all visitors.The ride to the island is free!!!

 

I hope we get a chance to save this magical flower of Tisa so that they could do their shortest and saddest love story for many years to come.

Each donation makes a difference

 

Thank you for your kindness!
story_txt:
Who are we?
We are a group of young enthusiasts from Serbia,who want their ideas and projects to change the way of thinking in humans and show how are a healthy environment and the nature important things for humans.We want to make the world a better place through various projects and fundraising campaigns.Help us improve the world,one project at the time.I am Dragoljub Milankov.Our team is currently small,but day by day it's becoming bigger,and our ideas are becoming more serious.    What is that"Tisa Mayfly"?
Unique world phenomenon THE FLOWER OF TISA(Palingenia Longicauda)The Tisa Mayfly (Palingenia longicauda) is the largest mayfly species in Europe,males measuring up to 12 cm (5 inches) from head to tail.This long-tailed mayflies are aquatic insects which belong to the Ephemeroptera order.Their larval stage usually lasts three years.The adults are short-lived: once fully matured,they have roughly three hours to mate and then die.Male Tisa Mayflies are unique among the winged insects in that they molt one more time after acquiring functional wings.This second-to-last winged instar is usually a matter of minutes.Tisa’s flower is an ancient insect species.Ascendants of this species emerged some 200 million years ago. Unlike many other species of mayflies, adult P.longicauda never move away from water;they fly low and their cerci are frequently touching or sweeping the surface.The slow-moving river and absence of surface-feeding fish help make this possible.The presence of P. longicauda is an indicator of clean unpolluted water. Now extinct in many European countries,it can be found in Serbia and Hungary on the Tisza river,as well as in Romania, About this phenomenonThis is rare scene, wedding dance above Tisa River. Only few days in June every year (even not every year),beautiful insect Tisa's flower or Tisa mayflies (Palingenia longicauda) are being born, making love and die.After three hours,everything is finished.Palingenia longicauda doesn't have mouth because it doesn't eat - it just makes love and dies, during his short but beautiful life. This is realy amazing scene and it is very hard to show it by photo or words...It is possible to enjoy one of the most beautiful natural phenomenons in the world that lasts only five days in early June. Thousands of yellow insects fly in fervor just above the river surface conjuring the creation of the universe.The Tisa flower lives for three years at the bottom of the river.It very well represents the essence of nature's imagination,which is for only a few hours perfectly reflected in the passion of these delicate beings.After mating, the female mayflies start a compensation flight up the river, to ensure that the eggs laid on the river will sink down to the bottom at the place where their parents emerged. After about 45 days, the eggs hatch into larvae, which remain buried in the mud for three years, until they emerge and molt into adults.When and where we can see Tisa Mayfly?Typically,all Tisa Mayflies mature at once,and for about a week in mid June(from 13 to 15 June),they will be everywhere after 5.00-6.00 PM,dancing over the river in large groups,molting on trees or on the ground, or resting on every available surface,including onlookers.This natural phenomenon with varied intensity is called Tisa blooming.Once they fully mature (after their second molting into a winged state),males have only a few hours to find females and mate before both sexes die. Squadrons of mature males will skim over the river's surface,seeking females.
Why  Tisa Mayfly is threatened?The mayflies are pollution-sensitive animals, thus if they are in or around the water, the water should be of a good quality. Besides being environmental indicators, the mayflies are also a favorite food of many fish, and consequently a favorite bait used by fishermen. The Tisa Mayfly has become extinct in many European countries, and now it can be seen only in Novi Becej,Serbia (Vojvodina province).We need to stop this and save Tisa Mayfly!!! 
What is our goal? Our goal is to research and preserve this amazing insect with funds collected trough this project.We need donations for equipment which would help us do in-depth analysis and research to find out the main problems of Mayfly extinction and how can we stop it.We want to make a documentary about this amazing insects, and to publish it free for all.We want people to preserve this phenomenon with us, for years to come.Also, one of the legends states that in Novi Becej in river Tisa Attila The Hun was buried.He was buried with his triple coffin – which was made of gold, silver and iron and rests at the bottom of the river Tisa.Many people believe and local stories of the elderly states that his burial site is near City Novi Becej on the bottom of the river, but to this day no research have been started in hope to find Attila the Hun’s treasure chest.The stories tell that Attila the Hun was located near the island in the middle of river Tisa, which can be visited.Also it’s a great location to research the Tisa flower insect.Also, each year In that time we have a celebration on river bank called Tisa River of love, where we celebrate this unique phenomenon and Love in general.In the evening you can see thousands of small floating candles all across the river.Also,with us you can visit interesting Island in the middle of Tisa river.On this island we love to enjoy with our family,friends...and that can expect all visitors.The ride to the island is free!!! I hope we get a chance to save this magical flower of Tisa so that they could do their shortest and saddest love story for many years to come.Each donation makes a difference Thank you for your kindness!

story:
SUSTAINABLE HUMANE EARTH:

 Earth Care - People Care

Begin your Sustainable Future with SHE now!  Sustainable Humane Earth is a holistic vision of human expression/heaven on earth in live action. The video above gives a brief summary of this important campaign. Sustainable Humane Earth starts as an aquaponics greenhouse powered by solar. Aquaponics offers the most sustainable use of water and food production in the world. The aquaponics greenhouse is a hub for training/education, employee opportunity and community outreach. Most importantly the greenhouse will provide sustainably, locally grown, organic healthy food to the Austin community!  With climate change, human waste and global unrest, SHE stands to be a responsible answer to these issues within our society.  Through our joined efforts we can make a positive global impact moving toward a Sustainable Humane Earth!

What are the needs & How You Benefit from your Participation

What does your participation support?

 Itemized List of Needs and Costs:

  • $100,000 Greenhouse Construction.
  • $35,000 Solar Installation.
  • $3000 Website Design and Construction.
  • $5000 Producing, Editing and Uploading of Educational Permaculture Videos.
  • $3000 Design Materials.
When we meet our original goal our "stretch goals" will take us to a higher potential for change! Furthermore, the remaining funds go toward future regenerative projects, event planning, producing work shops, engaging in community-building and community service.  Your participation directly influences a regenerative future and allows the vision of SHE to thrive.  This is truly a conception point and we can all make it happen together!


How are you Benefiting?

Of course, the main benefit is a deep-hearted tangible connection to your healthy and sustainable organic food. But let's get REAL, sometimes we have to give a little to get a lot!  Through this campaign we assure you...you'll be getting A LOT!  The combined value of the "Perks" list is $9,100!  SHE is a value-based company, which means the value is fundamentally embedded into the perks so that they benefit the family, community and environment of the giver. Give the gift that keeps on giving!

Perk Highlights! (See "Perks" section to make purchases.)

  • S.H.E. Tote Bag 
  • Healthy Living eBook $300 value
  • Select the "Eco Consultant" Perk and save hundreds on the initial eco-consulting and save thousands long term! More importantly, this conscious effort impacts the environment and surrounding community. 
  • Full-scale Permaculture Design of your home or business, a $700 value,  includes: eco-consulting and an in-depth short-term and long-term phase plans to create a Sustainable Humane Earth at your home or business.
  • S.H.E. is most excited about "The Love Date."  Love your bodies, minds, souls and enjoy fine dining on the very grounds of the S.H.E. greenhouse! Pick your own veggies from the farm and enjoy a deliciously prepared Ayurvedic fusion meal for you and your loved one or for family and friends! (No way to calculate value, you just have to experience it!) 
  • Live performance concert by Light Wheel for your business or private party $8000 value 

How will this vision participate in Sustainable Global Change?

The Sustainable Elements:

Aquaponics:
SHE has been partners with the oldest and largest Aquaponics Farm in Austin, Texas for several years.  Austin Aquaponics, created by Rob Nash, is an Austin staple of sustainable farming. Please view the "Central Texas Gardener" video link below for more information about Austin Aquaponics and how aquaponics uses far less water to grow produce. The first greenhouse of Sustainable Humane Earth is  being constructed on Austin Aquaponics property - a true community of sustainable organic farmers!

Urban Permaculture Design

By connecting local communities around the globe, through our actions, we can move towards a sustainable and regenerative future. Here's a simple example of what Permaculture Design can do for a 10ft by 20ft space in a backyard in 3 months time. Just imagine if we did this on a global scale!  Let's localize our food source together! 

Below are some great resources for understanding Permaculture Design a little better:

What is Permaculture?

Permaculture is a branch of ecological design, ecological engineering, and environmental design that develops sustainable architecture and self-maintained agricultural systems modeled from natural ecosystems.[1][2] The term permaculture (as a systematic method) was first coined by Australians Bill Mollison and David Holmgren in 1978. The word permaculture originally referred to "permanent agriculture"[3] but was expanded to stand also for "permanent culture," as it was seen that social aspects were integral to a truly sustainable system as inspired by Masanobu Fukuoka's natural farming philosophy.

Permaculture Principles:

  1. Observe and Interact
  2. Catch, Store and Reuse Energy.
  3. Obtain a Yield.
  4. Apply Self Regulation and Feedback.
  5. Use and Value Renewable Resources and Services.
  6. Produce Zero Waste.
  7. Design from Patterns and Details.
  8. Integrate rather than Segregate.
  9. Use Small Slow Solutions.
  10. Use and Value Diversity, Edges and the Marginal. 
  11. Creatively Use and Respond to Change.

Here are some links that give a small taste of what S.H.E. represents and supports:

https://www.facebook.com/sustainablehumaneearth (S.H.E. Facebook Page "Like Us")

http://tyagaraja.com/ (Tyagaraja's website)

http://youtu.be/OU7VzTaBWK4  (Tyagaraja's Permaculture and Sustainable Design Experience and Training v-folio)

http://youtu.be/uZB02JrpBZo (Urban Permaculture with Love, a small piece of what SHE is all about)

Solar Energy:

Tyagaraja trained in California with Westhaven Solar.  SHE created this video for Westhaven and SHE is partnering with Westhaven Solar to make certain ALL of Sustainable Humane Earth projects are powered by the most efficient, US made solar technology in the world! 

http://www.westhavensolar.com


 Other Ways You Can Help

Some people may not be able to contribute monetarily, but that doesn’t mean you can’t participate:

-Share links to our campaign on your social media Facebook, twitter, and/or linked in. Spread the word #SustainableHumaneEarth.

-Personal touch always works best.  Sending personal emails and messages with links to our campaign page is a great way to reach people and tell them why you personally support this vision.

Ongoing Programs and Service S.H.E. Produces and Sustains

Current Projects in Place:

  • Growing, Selling, Distributing Fresh, Healthy/Organic, Sustainably Grown Food to the Community
  • Educational Workshops
  • Educational Workshops at Southwestern University
  • 72 Acre Permaculture Design Installation at Austin Hindu Temple
  • Partnership with local Aquaponics Farm, "Austin Aquaponics," building AP greenhouses, education, further development through Permaculture Design.
  • Urban Permaculture Designs and Homesteads in Texas - Austin, Houston, Georgetown, Round Rock
  • Eco-Consulting for Business and Private Residences
  • Elementary School "Perma-Garden" installations and fun educational workshops
  • Yoga/Meditation workshops and retreats 
  • Live Music and Dance Performances

One goal of this campaign is a full-scale design of an interactive educational website based on permaculture principles and resource sharing.  This website will be a hub of activity, hosting live stream educational workshops and linking other like-minded communities and organizations. This website will truly take the local actions of SHE to the next level, producing greatly needed regenerative global change!  SHE nourishes with food, community, art and KNOWLEDGE!  Knowledge is POWER...Sustainable Power!

Here's a splash page while our website is constructed:

http://www.shenourishes.com

story:
The Moriches Bay Project is a grass roots project, our main goal is to improve the water quality in our local bays, We do this primarily through oyster farming and Eel grass planting. In addition we are committed to bringing awareness to the community and to educate our children. 

The bay is plagued with harmful algal blooms, which is what motivated us to find a solution. The reestablishment of oysters and eelgrass are critical to the stabilizing of the bays environment. we work to spread awareness about the fragility of the bay while championing the importance of its protection.  Together we have:

  •  Seeded roughly 80,000 oysters in the bay
  • Established the first oyster bed in Moriches Bay in over 1 decade
  • Installed the first water monitoring site in Moriches Bay
  • Initiated bay steward classes on the south shore
  • Implemented a mentoring program
  • Moved west into the town of Brookhaven and partnered with the town to set up  our  1st oyster farm
  • Partnered with local businesses and organizations who share our belief.
  • Gave Moriches Bay a voice

We as a community should feel proud of what we have accomplished in JUST 3 short years, BUT there is much work to do  to "Save our Bay"

Did you know that ONE adult oyster can filter 50 gallons of water a DAY? Just imagine what ONE MILLION could do !!

Just $1.00 will put 10 oysters in the bay and 10 oysters will filter 500 gallons of water EACH day! That is 180,000 gallons of water in a year ..NOW that a difference we can all clearly see and just think it only took $1.00

The Moriches Bay Project wants to thank all who helped us exceed all expectations last year !! 

Together  we raised over $22,000 it was incredible. What that showed us was THIS community cares about the BAY ..

Lets all come together again this holiday season.  Please DONATE and MOST important SPREAD the word - tell your friends, family co-workers, with your help we know we can reach a higher goal and continue our mission to SAVE our BAY.

We all live work and play on the bay we all have a responsibility to care for it!

every ONE of us can make a difference that can be clearly seen in our bay.

ALL DONATIONS ARE TAX DEDUCTIBLE - GET THEM IN BEFORE THE END OF THE YEAR

story:
Curse on Summit Rock

We are seeking funds to present a new children’s musical that teaches children to become stewards of the environment.  The play will be presented in Central Park and is free.

Curse on Summit Rock is set on the highest point in Central Park and will be performed in situ and al fresco on the natural stage on Central Park’s Summit Rock.  It’s about a developer who wants to build a candy store in the Park and how his plans to destroy the park are cleverly foiled by Park activists.  The play uses comedy, slap-stick, music, song and audience participation.

The book was written by George Bistransin who learned about playwrighting from translating the classical Latin farces of Plautus and the well-made French plays of Scribe and LaBiche.  His translations were produced through Theater Ludicrum, a non-profit theater company that presented Plautus for high school Latin students in Boston.   He is President of the Village Playwrights, a group that reads scripts to help writers develop their plays.

The music is composed by Lawrence Fancelli. Lawrence is a business graduate of Università degli studi di Firenze and also holds an Audio Engineering diploma from Alchemea in London. He plays clarinet, bass and piano. Among his influences are Debussy and Chaplin, even though the latter had no formal musical training.

The Impact

What is the greatest work of art in New York City?   Many people will respond that it’s Central Park.  The Park wasn’t found the way it is.  Nor did come about by accident.  Every inch of it is man-made.  It was designed by Frederick Law Olmsted and Calvert Vaux with great thought and some say genius.   There were, and still are, great pressures to change the original design and use the Park in ways that destroy its greatest value—that of providing urban dwellers with the psychological benefits country environment. 

Through comedy and song Curse on Summit Rock teaches the Olmsted’s design principles—the so called seven S’s: sanitation, suitability, scenery, subordination, service, style and separation.   It encourages activism and action—such as picking up litter.  The play also shows that we can succeed in protecting the environment if we put aside our differences and work together.   If you are a parent or educator who wants to impart values that encourage protecting the natural world, you will want to bring your charges to this play.

The play is engaging and entertaining for young children.   There is direct address and audience participation.  Actors go into the audience and it is the audience’s action that drives away the developer and protects the Park.   The play is also entertaining to adults.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $3000 for five performances.  Money will go for actors’ and accompanist’s stipends and other production expenses such as rehearsal space rental and audition costs. 

 

Actors............,,,,,,...$2000

Accompanist..,,,,,,,,..$500

Rehearsal Space.,,,..$250

Park Permits.....,,,,,,.$250

                        TOTAL                   $3000

 

If we don’t reach our entire goal, there will be fewer performances will be.  But there will be at least one performance regardless of how much is raised.  If we go over our goal, there will be more performances.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell everyone you know (especially if they have children) about the performances.  The dates are Sunday,  July 15, July 29, August 26 and September 16 at 3 pm.

story:
"Just because you live away from the oceans, doesn't mean you can't still make a difference to sharks worldwide. Making a difference today in the destructive Shark Fin Trade is easy..."


THE IMPACT

There is a harsh reality occurring in the oceans... Sharks will go extinct if we don't do something now. A recent IUCN report has identified over 1/3 of all shark species (more than 500 in total) are facing extinction – some in our lifetimes. Destroying sharks and the oceans isn't a legacy we want to leave for future generations.

Through the power of our TimeShark Wristwatch, we resolved to create a sustainable product that could address these alarming statistics. We’ve committed to ending the plight of sharks worldwide and with your help, stop the destruction of our marine ecosystems.

 

"100+ Million Sharks Die Each Year. Most are finned alive and dumped back into the ocean to suffer a horrible suffocating death..."

How it works:

The more TIMESHARK wristwatches we sell, the lower our costs go causing more money going towards saving sharks! For every TIMESHARK wristwatch sold, you are able to keep Sharks around the world alive by allowing one of our supporting charities to advance the worldwide conservation of sharks through...

Science - Tagging, tracking, and

Education - Teaching and educating individuals worldwide.

Influence - Spreading the word about the destruction of sharks through social media, media campaigns, documentaries and more.

Action - Building shark and ocean life sanctuaries around the world.

 

Also, because you asked us for it, with every contribution, you get to vote for which charity we will end up supporting. Proudly wear your watch knowing you are making a difference worldwide and remember that by getting friends and family involved, we can raise the percentage sent to the shark charity you want to support.


Starting the movement...

The TIMESHARK wristwatch represents a powerful movement that will continue to grow. By proudly wearing a TIMESHARK wristwatch, you will be making a difference to the future of these sharks. Through every watch sold, you will directly support shark conservation and education projects around the globe.

We designed the TIMESHARK wristwatch to mimic the beauty of Sharks as well as create a design that fits any style, outfit, or culture. Everything about the watch is beautiful. The battery lasts for about 2 years and of course, just like a shark, this watch is waterproof.



What's needed...

Manufacturing - With your help, we can get this great fashion wristwatch into production if we can cross the $25,000 together. We will invest $3 of every wristwatch (10% of revenue direct) purchased to the voted on charity but if we raise more than our current goal, our costs go down meaning a higher % will be given to the supported charity. We are already working with our manufacturing factory on production because we know you want your TIMESHARK wristwatch as soon as possible.

Growth - As we grow, we want to increase our support for these causes and get a TIMESHARK wristwatch on people around the world. In order to build upon this momentum, we need you to tell your friends & family... The simplist way to do that is through social media: POST ALL OVER FaceBook, ANNOUNCE ON Twitter, & SHARE YOUR PHOTOS AND STORIES ON INSTAGRAM!

BEFORE...

AFTER...

 

Look Sharp. Make a Difference.

The TIMESHARK wristwatch is an eco-fashion product that allows you to spread the message of the destruction if sharks while looking good & feeling good! Dedicate yourself to saving some sharks today.

Facts about sharks...

  • Sharks have been around for more than 400 million years
  • Sharks are intelligent and can be trained
  • 100 million sharks are killed each year for their fins
  • The largest shark is the Whale shark, averaging 9 metres (30 feet) in length—the size of a large bus
  • Whale sharks are not aggressive. They eat zooplankton, small fish and squid.
  • When a shark loses a tooth, a new one grows in its place
  • Mako and Blue sharks are the fastest swimming sharks
  • Sharks can take hours or even days to die after being finned
  • Sharks are a critical part of marine ecosystems

  

FAQ

I have a question... do you have answers?

Yes we do! If these FAQs haven't answered your question, please email us at: sharkwatch@warwhale.com

When will my watch be delivered?

Estimated Shipping Date: June 1st, 2013

We know you want to show off your watch, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible. We refuse to send you anything but the highest quality product!

Is there a warranty for the TIMESHARK wristwatch?

Yes. There is a 1-year warranty. If there are any defects, our repair center will fix it or replace it. However, we strive to provide the highest quality materials so this will not be an issue. Normal wear and tear, including scratches and dings, are not covered under the TIMESHARK warranty.

How long does the battery last?

The watch is battery-powered. The battery life depends on how often you check the time, but if you check about 6 times per day, it should last around 2 years.

Can the battery be changed?

You can definitely replace the battery.  Take it to any watch repair shop in your city and they'll be able to do it for you easily.

Is the watch waterproof?

YES! Just like a shark, your new watch can go under water.

Are the watches available in retail stores?

Not yet, but we have projects lined up for the furture to make this happen.

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

With every watch purchased, together we can protect the world of great shark by advancing the worldwide conservation of sharks through the shark charity which you as a contributer can vote for.

One "High Five Perk" = 1 Vote

One Wristwatch = 2 Votes

Two Wristwatches = 4 Votes

Etc.

The more TIMESHARK wristwatches we sell, the lower our costs go causing more money going towards saving sharks! Currently 10% of every TIMESHARK wristwatch sold, goes towards keeping Sharks around the world alive. You and three friends can easily make a huge impact. Our goal is to create an actual quantified change in the oceans around the world for each watch sold.

Where are the watches manufactured?

The watches are designed at by the people at WarWhale Creative Group from Alberta, Canada & assembled in China. The facility has passed the SA8000 (Social Accountability) and ISO14000 (Environmental) audits. Furthermore, our manufacturing facility is ROHS compliant.  

How do the watches work?  What functions do they provide?

The watch has a sharp design, both visually and functionally.  The fundamental purpose of a watch is to display the time, but it also has some neat features.

Full 12/24 hours display mode.

Year/month/date adjustable display.

Chronograh and Alarm Functions.

Full instructions will be included when the product is shipped. 

Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, there will need to be an additional charge to ship internationally. It costs $15 per watch to ship to international addresses.  If you buy a 2-watch couples-set ($60 perk), international shipping is $25. For a 4-watch shark-set ($120 perk), international shipping is $40.  Please include that in the checkout price.  If you forget, we'll contact you prior to shipping to finalize those details.

If you have any specific questions about your location, please email us.

 

 

Join the TIMESHARK Movement! 

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy a watch!  

With your purchase, you'll be making a real difference in protecting sharks around the world.

2. Tell your friends about TIMESHARK!  

Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms. Loving Sharks is the movement!

3. Support the Twitter hashtag #timesharknow

Every Wednesday and Friday at 4:00pm MST we will tweet #timesharknow to make it trend. To work, we need your help! Please follow us and re-tweet the message. Together, we'll inspire the world to stop the slaughter of sharks. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Join the cause to save sharks by getting vocal locally.
  • Sign the petition around the world including http://www.findonnelly.ca/sharkfin and http://sharkfinfreecalgary.org/
  • Remind your family and friends to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Refuse to eat in restaurants that serve shark fin soup or any other shark products
  • Do not shop in any grocery stores that sell shark – All sharks are endangered on a global level.
  • Tell as many people as you can about the wrongful act of shark finning.
  • Open your mind and understand these magnificent creatures.

Thank you! We hope you will join us today.
story_txt:
"Just because you live away from the oceans, doesn't mean you can't still make a difference to sharks worldwide. Making a difference today in the destructive Shark Fin Trade is easy..."

THE IMPACT

A recent IUCN report has identified over 1/3 of all shark species (more than 500 in total) are facing extinction – some in our lifetimes. story:
SUMMARY
Note: If for any reason we are unable to fulfill our obligation for the appropriate use of these funds the money raised will be donated to Arbor Day for tree planting.

Timothy Halligan and I became great friends while living in Baltimore, MD. We were avid book lovers and hopeful public servants. We spent hours discussing ideas on how to improve ourselves, our community and be supportive for those around us. We both carried a deep-seated drive to help others and change the world in some way.

We stayed in touch as our paths diverged - he to New York and I to Indiana and now North Carolina. I had an idea percolating for awhile and approached him. What if we took a stab at climate change? What could we do to help improve the environment? What isn't being done that we might do?

So Interstate Ecology came into being. The idea is simple: we raise money in our current locations using IndieGoGo, on the ground fund raising and grant writing. With the money we raise we we'll buy trees and shrubs as cheaply as possible and plant them along interstates and highways.

We are in our infant stages. We have a name, an idea and our filing routes lined up. With your funds we will begin the process of incorporation, web-domain and most importantly establishing funds for trees. The monetary breakdown is presented in the next section.

Our current project starting points are along the I-70 Corridor in Ohio, Indiana and Illinois and the greater Indianapolis area. All projects are subject to approval from appropriate governing bodies. Suggestions for planting areas are always welcomed!

We are working with a Landscape Designer (Katie Fifer, Purdue '11) to choose the most appropriate trees and shrubs to ensure best survival, supporting native landscape, and planting methods.

The tree and shrub planting will be carried out by our members and any volunteers gained along the way!

What We Need & What You Get

We need money for the following things:

80%
-Trees & Shrubs
-Root Stimulator
-Fertilizer
-Discretionary Supplies
-Transporting Trees and Supplies to Project Sites

20%
-Web Domain
-Administrative Filing Fees (Non profit incorporation, IRS tax-exempt forms, charitable solicitation license)

Perks:
$5 - Personalized Voice Mail Thank You From Tim or Don or Both
$10 (or multiples of $10) - Certificate of Trees Planted in Honor Of ________
$15 - Handwritten Letter of Appreciation (each one original!) & Certificate
$100 - Named under our "Fantastic Donors" page on our TBD website



The Impact

A project like this has multiple positive impacts:

-Small step towards fighting pollution
-Aesthetically improves normally dreary highway and interstate commutes
-Restoring unused land closer to native habitats

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot donate money maybe someone you know can. It's important that we get our message and purpose out to the world. Sharing our campaign on your Facebook, telling a friend, commenting on our IndieGoGo page to show your support - everything helps!

If you cannot donate funds yourself but consider yourself a handy fundraiser, let us know! We always appreciate any self-driven field campaigns in your local area. Or if you know an area you think would be a suitable site let us know and we'll see if we can make it happen!

story:
Overview

We’re on a mission to make it easier for people to avoid single-use plastic packaging and create less waste. In order to do this we need new, lightweight and more durable reusable containers. If you like our concept and want to see the zero waste movement grow - we are in need of your support!

Big hugs,
Sarah & Hanna, Co-Founders of Unwrapped

 

 

Sarah & Hanna

We are two passionate mothers who want to contribute to a more sustainable future for our kids by helping others to reduce their waste!

Last year we got sick and tired of the mountains of single-use plastic packaging that we were bringing home and decided to take action. We followed our hearts into becoming the change we wanted to see in the world and started our company - Unwrapped!

Unwrapped is an online zero waste store selling mostly organic dry wholefoods - such as beans, lentils, pasta, grains, granola, nuts, seeds, coffee, chocolate and spices. We also offer home/hygiene products - such as soap, shampoo, conditioner, deodorant, toothbrushes and period underwear.

 

 

Our Circular System

We have created a circular system where you borrow the containers from us. You choose from our assortment of products, which we pack in reusable containers, and deliver to you. At home, you transfer the products into your own containers. When your ready, you send the empty containers back to us so that we can, wash, clean, reuse and repeat this cycle, aiming to reduce as much single-use plastic packaging as possible.

But to make our concept available for everyone in Sweden we need your help!

 

Our Goal

We're running this crowdfunding campaign to raise money to buy new, lightweight and more durable containers. We have teamed up with Nordiska Plast right here in Sweden, who make containers made out of fossil free plastic from renewable resources. We are hoping to raise 50,000 SEK and if we raise enough money we could even look into creating reusable delivery boxes to avoid even more packaging!

 

 

But Why?

Did you know that only 10% of the plastic that you recycle is actually being recycled while the rest is burned? The burning of plastic creates toxic emissions which are seriously harmful for us and our planet. 

Isn’t it crazy to use something for a few seconds and then throw it away? What if there was another way, a way to create less trash and reduce your household waste? Here is where Unwrapped comes in. 

By shopping Unwrapped we can help you:

  • Produce less household waste and run fewer times to the recycling station.
  • Use less of our earths energy and resources by avoiding single-use plastic packaging.
  • Eat more sustainably by offering mostly organic and vegan wholefoods. 


Doesn’t this sound awesome?

 

 

Your Impact

Up until now, Unwrapped has been running 100% on personal savings and we are now at a crucial point to either make it or break it. Your contribution would enable us to take our reusable cycle to the next stage, helping more people to avoid single-use plastic packaging. Reusing needs to be normalised and we all need to work towards creating a circular economy. 

There is strength in numbers and together we can work against plastic pollution to reduce our carbon footprint, living more in harmony with our planet.

Thank you for taking the time to read about our mission and support our dreams! If you want to hear more, we would love to hear from you - hello@unwrapped.se 

More hugs,
Sarah & Hanna, Co-Founders of Unwrapped

story:
Gegen das Bienensterben

Mit der Bienen-Sauna retten wir Bienen und erhalten uns eine lebenswerte Umwelt.

"Wenn die Biene von der Erde verschwindet, hat der Mensch nur noch vier Jahre zu leben." Albert Einstein

Das Problem

Die Varroa-Milbe ist gnadenlos: Sie beißt sich an ihrem Bienen-Opfer fest und schwächt deren Brut. Weltweit werden Bienenvölker von dieser Milbe befallen. Neben Pestiziden und Monokulturen ist die Varroa-Milbe das größte Problem für die Honigbiene. Sie gilt als Hauptverursacher des massenhaften Bienensterbens. Wehren können sich die Bienen kaum dagegen. Es gibt praktisch kein Bienenvolk mehr, das nicht von der Varroa-Milbe geschwächt ist. Bisher wurde vor allem auf Gift und Säure gesetzt – oft mit dem Risiko, das ganze Bienenvolk zu verlieren oder sogar schädliche Rückstände im Honig in Kauf zu nehmen.

Die Bedrohung

Äpfel, Birnen, Kirschen, Aprikosen, Pflaumen – sie sind köstlich und bilden die Grundlage für unsere gesunde Ernährung. Für diese gesunde Vielfalt sorgt die Honigbiene. Aber von den ehemals Millionen Bienenvölkern in Deutschland sind lediglich 700.000 Völker übrig. Diese Entwicklung bedroht auch uns Menschen direkt. Denn wir sind extrem abhängig von der Bestäubungsleistung der kleinen Flieger. Hierzulande sind 75 Prozent der Blütenpflanzen auf Bestäubung angewiesen. Die meisten Obst- und Gemüsesorten können wir ohne die fleißigen Helfer nicht mehr im Supermarkt kaufen. Jeder dritte Bissen unseres Essens ist von Bienen abhängig.

Die Lösung

Um das Massensterben von hunderttausenden Bienenvölkern zu stoppen, nutzen wir eine uralte Behandlungsmethode - die Wärme. Während Menschen die Sauna aufsuchen, um sich zu entspannen oder ihren Stoffwechsel anzuregen, können Bienen die Varroamilben durch zwei gepflegte Saunagänge im Jahr los werden. Die Biene "schwitzt" sich gesund, während die wärmeempfindliche Milbe stirbt. Das Ergebnis: gesunde, vitale Bienenvölker und gesundes Obst und Gemüse für uns Menschen.

    Der Erfolg

    “Anfang des Jahres wurde mein schwächstes Bienenvolk mit der Bienen-Sauna behandelt. Jetzt gehört es zu den stärksten Bienenvölkern und trägt mehr Honig ein als jedes andere Volk. Ich bin absolut begeistert und habe schon ein Gerät vorbestellt.”  Karin Backman, Imkerin

    “Ich habe die Varroa jahrelang mit Gift bekämpft. Aber damit leider auch die nützlichen Mikroorganismen. Bei seiner ersten öffentlichen Vorführung der Bienen-Sauna behandelte Richard eines meiner Bienenvölker. Mit durchschlagendem Erfolg. Es entwickelte sich unerwartet gut zum stärksten Volk am Stand.”  Klas Fürtig, Imker

    Werde zum Bienenretter

    • Mit der Bienen-Sauna können Imker ihre Bienen auf natürliche und unschädliche Weise von Milben befreien.
    • Damit hilfst Du ganz konkret, eine Ursache des großen Bienensterbens zu bekämpfen.
    • Denn durch die Wärmebehandlung wird das gesamte Bienenvolk vitaler und kann negativen Umwelteinflüssen besser trotzen.
    • Du stärkst die Lebensgrundlagen der Bienen und sicherst auch uns Menschen eine lebenswerte Umwelt - mit unseren Bienen.

    Unterstütze uns jetzt!

    Die besten Partner

    Uns ist es gelungen renommierte Bio-Unternehmen für uns zu gewinnen: Daher können wir Dir richtig gute Perks anbieten. Dazu gehören Gewürze, Tee, Saft von Streuobstwiesen und natürlich aus eigener Produktion Honig und Kerzen, zum Teil direkt als Weihnachtsgeschenk.

    Kaufe jetzt tolle Perks und rette als Tier- und Umweltfreund mit uns die Bienen!

    Wofür wird das eingesammelte Geld eingesetzt?

    Wir wollen eine erste Kleinserie der Bienen-Sauna produzieren.

    50 Imker haben uns schon vertraut und eine Bienen-Sauna vorbestellt.

    Für die Bienen und für uns ist das ein riesiger Erfolg. Aber wir wollen noch mehr: Wir wollen weitere Bienen-Saunen produzieren. Doch die erste Kleinserie ist teuer in der Produktion. Trotzdem bieten wir die Bienen-Sauna für die Imker zu einem erschwinglichen Preis an. Um diese Finanzierungslücke zu schließen, benötigen wir noch 10.000 Euro.

    Mit Deiner Unterstützung hilfst du uns, dass sich die ersten Bienen schon im nächsten Frühjahr in der Sauna gesund schwitzen können.

    Die Bienen-Sauna

    Die Bienen-Sauna hat eine Lebensdauer von 15 Jahren. Wir stellen Ersatzteile und einen Reparaturservice bereit und sehen die Bienen-Sauna als einen ersten Schritt für eine nachhaltige Bienen-Fürsorge. Die Behandlung erfolgt zweimal im Jahr. Das genügt, um kranke und geschwächte Völker in vitale und gesunde Bienen zu verwandeln. Wenn Du einmal das magische Feld erlebt hast, das ein gesundes Bienenvolk mit seinem Summen und seiner harmonischen Emsigkeit erzeugt, weißt Du, was wir meinen.

    Mehr Informationen gibt es auf www.wir-retten-bienen.org.

    Über uns

    Erfinder Richard Rossa
    Ich bin Ingenieur für Regelungs- und Verfahrenstechnik. Vor rund sieben Jahren fing ich mit dem Imkern an. Die Bienen haben mich von Anfang an in ihren Bann gezogen. Ich habe großen Respekt vor diesen Wesen. Und das nicht nur wegen ihrer Unentbehrlichkeit für unsere Umwelt und unser Leben. Wenn Du einmal das magische Feld erlebt hast, das ein esundes Bienenvolk mit seinem Summen und seiner harmonischen Emsigkeit erzeugt, weißt Du, was ich meine. Für mich ist es eine Herzensangelegenheit, für die Gesundheit und das Wohlergehen der Bienen zu sorgen. Die Bekämpfung der Varroamilbe ist dabei von zentraler Bedeutung.

    Manager Florian Deising
    Ich war Unternehmensberater, Finanzmanager und leitete internationale Projekte in großen Konzernen. Vor zwei Jahren stieg ich aus, um sozusagen hauptberuflich unsere Welt ein Stück besser zu machen. Ich gründete mit einem Freund PowerAthleten, um Sportförderung mit umweltfreundlichem Konsum zu verbinden. Dazu leiste ich freiberuflich organisatorische Unterstützung für Sozialunternehmer, eben auch für die Bienen-Sauna.

    Warum bin ich als Nicht-Imker bei diesem Projekt dabei?
    Weil ich sofort erkannt habe, dass dieses Gerät Bienen rettet, ihre Lebenskraft stärkt und im besten Sinne unsere Umwelt schützt.

    Bekannt aus

    • Fundscene.com
    • Biorama.eu
    • Green-friday.de
    • energiezukunft.eu
    • WiwoGreen.de
    • Klimaretter.info

    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

    Manche von Euch können finanziell einfach keinen Beitrag leisten, das heißt aber nicht, dass Ihr nicht helfen könnt:

    • Sprich bitte über diese Kampagne und mach sie so bekannter.
    • Frage uns nach Flyern. Wir schicken sie Dir direkt nach Hause. 

    Hinweis: Imker können die Bienen-Sauna über www.bienen-sauna.de und sich dort ausführlich über alle Vorteile des Gerätes informieren.
story_txt:
Gegen das Bienensterben
Mit der Bienen-Sauna retten wir Bienen und erhalten uns eine lebenswerte Umwelt.

"Wenn die Biene von der Erde verschwindet, hat der Mensch nur noch vier Jahre zu leben." Albert Einstein


Das Problem
Die Varroa-Milbe ist gnadenlos: Sie beißt sich an ihrem Bienen-Opfer fest und schwächt deren Brut. Weltweit werden Bienenvölker von dieser Milbe 
 befallen. Neben Pestiziden und Monokulturen ist die Varroa-Milbe das größte Problem für die Honigbiene. Sie gilt als Hauptverursacher des massenhaften 
Bienensterbens. Wehren können sich die Bienen kaum dagegen. Es gibt praktisch kein 
Bienenvolk mehr, das nicht von der Varroa-Milbe geschwächt ist. Bisher wurde vor allem auf Gift und Säure gesetzt – oft mit 
dem Risiko, das ganze Bienenvolk zu verlieren oder sogar schädliche 
Rückstände im Honig in Kauf zu nehmen.
Die Bedrohung

Äpfel, Birnen, Kirschen, Aprikosen, Pflaumen – sie sind köstlich und bilden die Grundlage für unsere gesunde Ernährung. Für diese gesunde Vielfalt sorgt die Honigbiene. Aber von den ehemals Millionen Bienenvölkern in Deutschland sind lediglich 700.000 Völker übrig. Diese Entwicklung bedroht auch uns Menschen direkt. Denn wir sind extrem 
abhängig von der Bestäubungsleistung der kleinen Flieger. Hierzulande 
sind 75 Prozent der Blütenpflanzen auf Bestäubung angewiesen. Die 
meisten Obst- und Gemüsesorten können wir ohne die fleißigen Helfer 
nicht mehr im Supermarkt kaufen. Jeder
 dritte Bissen unseres Essens ist von Bienen abhängig.
Die Lösung

Um das Massensterben von hunderttausenden 
Bienenvölkern zu stoppen, nutzen wir eine uralte Behandlungsmethode - die Wärme. Während Menschen die Sauna aufsuchen, um sich zu entspannen oder ihren Stoffwechsel anzuregen, können Bienen 
die Varroamilben durch zwei gepflegte 
Saunagänge im Jahr los werden. Die Biene "schwitzt" sich gesund, während die 
wärmeempfindliche Milbe stirbt. Das Ergebnis: gesunde, vitale 
Bienenvölker und gesundes Obst und Gemüse für uns Menschen. 







Der Erfolg

behandelt. Jetzt gehört es zu den stärksten Bienenvölkern und trägt mehr
 Honig ein als jedes andere Volk. Ich bin absolut begeistert und habe 
schon ein Gerät vorbestellt.”  Karin Backman, Imkerin
“Ich
 habe die Varroa jahrelang mit Gift bekämpft. Aber damit leider auch die
 nützlichen Mikroorganismen. Bei seiner ersten öffentlichen Vorführung 
der Bienen-Sauna behandelte Richard eines meiner Bienenvölker. Mit 
durchschlagendem Erfolg. Es entwickelte sich unerwartet gut zum 
stärksten Volk am Stand.”  Klas Fürtig, Imker

Mit der Bienen-Sauna können Imker ihre Bienen auf natürliche und unschädliche Weise von Milben befreien. 

Damit hilfst Du ganz konkret, eine Ursache des großen Bienensterbens zu bekämpfen.

Denn durch die Wärmebehandlung wird das gesamte Bienenvolk vitaler und kann negativen Umwelteinflüssen besser trotzen. 

Du stärkst die Lebensgrundlagen der Bienen und sicherst auch uns Menschen eine lebenswerte Umwelt - mit unseren Bienen.



Unterstütze uns jetzt! 


Die besten Partner 


Uns ist es gelungen renommierte Bio-Unternehmen für uns zu 
gewinnen: Daher können wir Dir richtig gute Perks anbieten. Dazu gehören
 Gewürze, Tee, Saft von Streuobstwiesen und natürlich aus eigener 
Produktion Honig und Kerzen, zum Teil direkt als Weihnachtsgeschenk.
Kaufe jetzt tolle Perks und rette als Tier- und Umweltfreund mit uns die Bienen!

story:
We're not here to talk about problems ... we're here to solve them!

>>> Watch this <<<

Our fundraising campaign is to help us finish what we've already put years of work into.

This site will show you easy solutions to big problems like climate change, global warming, and much more.

The solutions to these issues are actually much easier than you think, but figuring out what you can do is the hard part.

We've conducted extensive research, interviewed several top minds, and are creating a series of very short, easy to understand movies to show you these issues and their solutions. Plus we're building an interactive site that will keep the viewer involved, empowered, and engaged.

Also all donations are a tax write-off.

We have the structure of the site completed and have some videos posted here that you can see!

>>> Click here <<<

and

>>> Click here <<<

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal of $25k is the minimum we need to launch this project, produce more videos, and update the functionality of the website.

How does this benefit you? 

First, it will make it easy for all of us to help preserve our ability to live on this beautiful planet.

As simple as the site looks compiling the information, verifying it's accuracy, and listing the solutions is extremely time consuming.

For the short videos on global warming alone we:

   • Consulted and interviewed several leading experts
   • Reviewed and cataloged over 500 articles
   • Produced the videos (audio, scripting, graphics, etc ... very time consuming)

This content will save you months of research and help us preserve a planet that will sustain our lives!

Plus the solutions save you money and will make you healthier! It's a no brainer!

Please review our Board of Advisers ... top notch people we are very proud to be working with.

>>> Click here <<<

Many generous and concerned individuals have already donated time, energy, and money to this project. We will be listing their names on our site soon.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please sign up on our mailing list to watch our progress.

>>> Click here <<<

Also spread the word via email, Facebook, Twitter, and other social media outlets!


We are all are the solution ... let's do this!

* with enough funding we plan on throwing a fantastic launch party. Certain donation amounts will get you tickets to this event.

story:
Going solar should be fun, not stressful!

I want to share my passion for solar energy to accelerate its use by homeowners across the nation, and I can use your help! 

Today over 85% of the energy we use on a daily basis comes from fossil fuels. We know that solar represents a clean and sustainable source of energy, yet we get less than 1% of our energy today from solar.

Many homeowners don't consider solar because they are unfamiliar with the technology, don't recognize the potential to save money or they are uncertain whether it can work on their home. I will produce the go-to resource to help homeowners gain the knowledge and confidence to join the solar revolution, all while having fun!

Solar is an expensive and complex product to purchase. While there is a lot of information available on the internet about solar energy, most of it is dry, overly complex and not accessible to the average person.  Through free access to educational videos and one-on-one coaching to answer specific solar questions, homeowners will gain the knowledge and confidence to make smart solar choices with easily understood and independent information provided on the Go Solar Coach website. 

We have all heard the predictions about climate change and many of us have experienced the impacts, be it record heat or rain fall and the devastation that these events can cause to communities. The decision to install solar represents one of the most powerful actions a homeowner can take to demonstrate their commitment to a safe and sustainable future.

With over 20 years of experience as an educator and solar energy researcher, I have the knowledge to provide homeowners with independent information and expert advice to help determine if going solar is right for their families.

With favorable federal and state policies and the fact that the price of solar has declined rapidly in recent years, homeowners can both save money and reduce their carbon footprint by going solar. Solar energy is booming in the US and around the world. Today approximately 1 million US households have gone solar. However, this still only represents a small portion of the overall potential. New approaches are needed to reach a broader segment of the population to engage them in the benefits of going solar. The goal of this campaign is to create a valuable resource to encourage homeowners unfamiliar with solar energy to join the solar revolution!

About Steve

Steve and his wife Kathy and teenage daughter Emery live in central Vermont in a super insulated home that uses natural building materials to create a unique and low energy modern home. His home uses solar in three ways: to provide hot water and supplemental home heating during Vermont’s cold winters and to provide electricity year-round through a grid-tied solar photovoltaic array. With over 20 years of experience teaching energy courses and doing energy consulting, Steve will share his expertise with a broader audience to accelerate the inevitable transition to a clean energy future.

Steve likes good, hoppy beer. Luckily Vermont is known for having the most microbreweries per capita of any state!  Steve also likes to laugh, listen to music, snowboard, mountain bike, spend time with family & friends and read widely on economic history and policy.

The Boring Stuff

  • Steve has a PhD in energy economics and policy from the University of Delaware and a MA degree in economics from Binghamton University in western New York State.
  • Steve is a professor of economics and environmental studies at Green Mountain College and a distance learning instructor for Vermont Law School.
  • Steve has an energy consulting practice and has conducted research for a variety of organizations including two of the U.S. Department of Energy’s national laboratories, the Solar Electric Power Association, and Vermont’s Green Mountain Power.
  • Steve is a frequent presenter at professional meetings and conferences and has published dozens of reports and articles in leading journals on a variety of energy topics. For a list and downloadable files of Steve’s research please visit his faculty web site at Green Mountain College.

The Funding Request

The Go Solar Coach campaign seeks to raise $7,000 to produce eight educational videos on solar energy and to build a fun and whimsical web site that draws people in. I am working with a talented graphic designer Riley Moore located in Manchester Vermont to create the educational videos on solar energy and build a web site to host the video content and to schedule one-on-one consultations to answer homeowners' specific questions if they need additional coaching.

The eight educational videos are organized into a Go Solar Starter Video Series and a Go Solar Pro Video Series, each with fun and informative videos based on my decades of experience as an educator and solar energy research scientist. Below is an outline of the Go Solar videos series. Please take a moment to view the outline and the two early-release videos (links below) to get a feel for my fun and whimsical approach to reaching new audiences with information to help homeowners go solar.

I'm making these early release videos available to you since you've shown some interest in what I'm about. If you have any feedback, I would welcome it!

Here is the working outline of the solar educational videos to be developed:

Go Solar Starter Video Series (GSSVS)

Educational videos for the very beginner not familiar with solar or home energy use concepts. These videos will help homeowners understand how solar can be used in the home and how to determine if their home or property is suitable for solar.

GSSVS #1:  Sunshine Daydream (Click link to see early release video.)

  • This video covers the basics of solar energy and the ways in which we can capture solar energy for use in our homes.

GSSVS #2:  Efficiency First!

You can perhaps skip this one, but I’ll be pissed ; )

  • This video will cover the basics of how you can strive to use less energy in your home through investments in energy efficient appliances and simple changes in behaviors—yes the C word—Conservation.

GSSVS#3:  Is My Home Solar Friendly?

  • Here in the third video of the Go Solar Starter Video Series we cut to the chase and help you become a solar sleuth. Specifically, you will learn how to do a quick assessment of your home and property for good solar access.

GSSVS #4:  Box of Sun

  • In the final video in the Go Solar Starter Video Series, you will learn about all of the major components of a home solar energy system that can power your home for decades to come.

Go Solar Pro Video Series (GSPVS)

Educational videos for those who understand solar energy basics and household energy use concepts but need additional information about the process of going solar. These videos are designed to help homeowners feel confident to engage a local, qualified solar installer.

GSPVS #1:  Solar Accounting (Click link to see early release video.)

  • Solar saves you money because you stop paying the utility and produce your own power—what a Deal! In the solar biz they call the process of accounting for the electricity you produce with solar versus what you consume in your home as net metering.

GSPVS #2:  Plug Your Home into the Sun

  • This video will cover the process of connecting a home solar energy system to the power grid through your home electric meter. In the solar biz they call this interconnection. 

GSPVS #3:  How Many Solar Panels Would I Need?

  • In this video, the Go Solar Coach will walk you through the process of determining how many solar panels you will most likely need for your roof or ground mounted home PV system to meet your household electricity needs.

GSPVS #4:  Selecting a Qualified Installer & Financing Your Solar System

  • Selecting a quality solar installer and finding the best way to finance your new investment are always BIG concerns, again the Go Solar Coach to the rescue! In this video we will cover how to select a qualified installer and all the different ways to pay for solar from crowd source funding, bank financing, to leasing.

How You Can Help

Financial contributions to the campaign will entitle you to free Go Solar Coach branded merchandise and advanced access to the educational videos.

Sticker 2.5" x 4"

Drink Koozie

Tie Dyed T-Shirt

Other support is welcome, including marketing advice and support, and promoting the campaign to your networks. Be part of the Solar Revolution, spread the word about this Go Solar Coach campaign...I would be Grateful!

  • Share it on Facebook 
  • Email it to five friends

THANK YOU!

The Go Solar Coach believes in paying it forward and will donate 5% of all proceeds from this campaign to the Solar Electric Light Fund, a non-profit dedicated to designing and implementing solar energy solutions to assist the 1.5 billion people living in energy poverty with their economic, educational, health care and agricultural development.
